register.description: IP Revision Identifier (X.Y.R) Used by software to track features, bugs, and compatibility
Information about the IP module's hardware configuration, i.e. typically the module's HDL generics (if any).
Information about the IP module's hardware configuration, i.e. typically the module's HDL generics (if any).

bitfield.description: Precision of accumulator 0 Number of Bits = value + 20
Precision of accumulator 0 Number of Bits = value + 20

register.description: Clock management configuration
Per-event raw interrupt status vector, line #0. Raw status is set even if event is not enabled.

bitfield.description: Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #1
End of frame event of BSC pipe #0

register.description: Per-event 'enabled' interrupt status vector, line #0. Enabled status isn't set unless event is enabled.

bitfield.description: Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #1
End of frame event of BSC pipe #0

register.description: Per-event interrupt enable bit vector Write 1 to set (enable interrupt). Readout equal to corresponding register.

bitfield.description: Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #1
End of frame event of BSC pipe #0

register.description: Per-event interrupt enable bit vector Write 1 to clear (disable interrupt). Readout equal to corresponding register.

bitfield.description: Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #1
End of frame event of BSC pipe #0

register.description: DMAREQUEST[0] Bits 7..0 DMAREQUEST[1] Bits 15..8 DMAREQUEST[2] Bits 23..16 DMAREQUEST[3] Bits 31..24 Write 1 to set (enable DMA request generation). Readout equal to corresponding register.

bitfield.description: Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #1
Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #0

register.description: DMAREQUEST[0] Bits 7..0 DMAREQUEST[1] Bits 15..8 DMAREQUEST[2] Bits 23..16 DMAREQUEST[3] Bits 31..24 Write 1 to clear (disable DMA request generation). Readout equal to corresponding register.

bitfield.description: Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #1
Output video port end of frame event.
End of frame event of BSC pipe #0

register.description: Global control of the BYS module

bitfield.description: Indicates the shadow register currently in use by the hardware. Register written by hardware. Software must check this before writing the BYS_CTRL register when BYS is active, so that a write into EN_SHADOW bit-field does not unintentially swap banks. Read 0x0: No shadowing. Hardware and software access bank 0. Read 0x1: No shadowing. Hardware and software access bank 1. Read 0x2: Shadowing. Hardware access bank 0 and software access bank 1. Read 0x3: Shadowing. Hardware access bank 1 and software access bank 0.

bitenum.description: Autogating enabled. This is the recommended behavior
Autogating disabled Power consumption is increased. Only for debug purposes.

bitfield.description: Controls gating of the output video port clock

bitenum.description: Auto-gating. The video port clock is - enabled when pixels are sent - enabled 4 cycles before the 1st pixel is sent - disabled 4 pixels after the last pixel has been sent - disabled otherwise
The pixel clock is free-running during blanking
Disabled. Bayer scaler processing is bypassed (i.e. the output of the bayer scaler is the same than the bayer scaler input)

bitfield.description: Controls register shadowing. Register written by software.

bitenum.description: No shadowing. Hardware and software access bank 0
No shadowing. Hardware and software access bank 1
Shadowing. Hardware access bank 1 and software access bank 0.
Shadowing. Hardware access bank 0 and software access bank 1.
Module disabled. Incoming pixels are ignored.
Enabled Incoming pixels will be processed.

register.description: Horizontal cropping settings. SKIP and COUNT positions must be multiples of 4 pixels.

bitfield.description: In steps of 4 pixels (i.e. write number of pixels to count divided by 4 into this register)
In steps of 4 pixels (i.e. write number of pixels to skip divided by 4 into this register)
Vertical pixel count to be sent through
Number of vertical skip of pixels

register.description: Initial phase - horizontal scaler

bitfield.description: Horizantal Phase init for odd line
Horizantal Phase init for even line

register.description: Initial phase - vertical scaler

bitfield.description: vertical Phase init for odd line
vertical Phase init for even line

register.description: Image size writen by the bayer scaler into the output FIFO.

bitfield.description: Max output number of lines size Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT
Max output line size Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH

register.description: Controls the data readout rate from the H2V and OUTPUT FIFOs

bitfield.description: Output buffer readout speed. U1.15 Valid range: 0.000030517578125 .. 1
H2V buffer readout speed. U1.15 Valid range: 0.000030517578125 .. 1

register.description: Sets threshold adaptation based on brightness of neighborhood. This is a linear function

bitfield.description: U12 Minimum brightness level to begin increasing threshold

register.description: Sets DPC detection threshold limits
Line number for the LINE IRQ.
Global control of the BSC pipe

bitenum.description: Disabled. The module is bypassed: PIXOUT=PIXIN
Disabled The module is bypassed: PIXOUT=PIXIN

register.description: LSC OFT
Linear coefficients
Quadratic coefficients
Shift lenghts
Gain Adjustments 0
Gain Adjustments 1
Total offsets 0
Total offsets 1
S0 Gain Shift Length
Gain Maximum Value
Pixel positions
Pixel positions
Pixel offsets
Pixel offsets
Pixel slopes
Pixel slopes

Controls access to BSC memories. Only 512 accumulator values per pipe are mapped into the addres space. The page ID is automatically incremented when the last location of a page is accesses. Alternatively, software directly chose the page number for each accumulator.

bitfield.description: Enables automatic page increment for the corresponding accumulator pipe #1 when the last location has been accessed
Enables automatic page increment for the corresponding accumulator pipe #0 when the last location has been accessed

register.description: Number of DMA requests to generate per pipeline minus 1

bitfield.description: Number of DMA requests for accumulator pipe #1
Number of DMA requests for accumulator pipe #0

register.description: Global control of the BSC module

bitfield.description: The down shift value before accumulation. Range: 0-7

bitenum.description: Don't reset accumulators. Add new data to data already in the memory

bitfield.description: Select accumulator organization in the memory

bitenum.description: Disabled. No statistics are collected for this pipeline. The memory content is left unchanged.

register.description: Global control of the BSC module

bitfield.description: The down shift value before accumulation. Range: 0-7

bitenum.description: Don't reset accumulators. Add new data to data already in the memory

bitfield.description: Select accumulator organization in the memory

bitenum.description: Disabled. No statistics are collected for this pipeline. The memory content is left unchanged.

register.description: Position of the top left corner analyzed by BSC

bitfield.description: The V position of left-top of the sampled frame Valid range: 0.. (BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT - 1)
The H position of left-top of the sampled frame Valid range: 0.. (BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH - 1)

register.description: Position of the top left corner analyzed by BSC

bitfield.description: The V position of left-top of the sampled frame Valid range: 0.. (BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT - 1)
The H position of left-top of the sampled frame Valid range: 0.. (BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH - 1)

register.description: Bin size

bitfield.description: The height of the rectangle Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT
The width of the rectangle Valid range: If BSC_CTRL_i[1] SEL = 0: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH If BSC_CTRL_i[1] SEL = 1: 2.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH

register.description: Bin size

bitfield.description: The height of the rectangle Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT
The width of the rectangle Valid range: If BSC_CTRL_i[1] SEL = 0: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH If BSC_CTRL_i[1] SEL = 1: 2.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH

register.description: Number of bins in each direction software must ensure that HCNT*VCNT <= [] ACCi_COUNT, where i = 0 to 1

bitfield.description: Number of bins in the vertical direction (the vertical number of rectangles in the frame) Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT
Number of bins in the horizontal direction (the horizontal number of rectangles in the frame) Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH

register.description: Number of bins in each direction software must ensure that HCNT*VCNT <= [] ACCi_COUNT, where i = 0 to 1

bitfield.description: Number of bins in the vertical direction (the vertical number of rectangles in the frame) Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[27:15] MAX_OHEIGHT
Number of bins in the horizontal direction (the horizontal number of rectangles in the frame) Valid range: 1.. BYS_HL_HWINFO[14:2] MAX_OWIDTH
